task: Schedule an appointment or meeting in the calendar.
Send a reminder for upcoming events or deadlines.
Send an email to a specific contact.
Perform a web search to find information.
Place an online order for groceries or other items.
Provide weather forecasts for a specific location.
Manage and play a music playlist.
Turn smart home devices on or off (e.g., lights, thermostat).
Make a phone call to a specific contact.
Send a text message to a specific contact.
Provide directions to a destination.
Book a ride-sharing service.
Translate text from one language to another.
Convert currency, measurements, or other units.
Provide news headlines or updates.
Manage to-do lists or tasks.
Stream a video from a specified service.
Take notes or transcribe spoken content.
Read aloud text from an article, book, or webpage.
Provide recommendations for restaurants or entertainment.
Manage and set alarms or timers.
Track physical exercise and provide workout suggestions.
Monitor health metrics like heart rate or sleep quality.
Answer trivia questions or play interactive games.
Provide cooking recipes or instructions.
